dtliExcerpt: Death Becomes Her has been reborn on Broadway as a rousing, raucously entertaining hit, the kind of big, box-ticking blockbuster that one can see sticking around for a long time.

keyPhrases.quote: sticking around for a long time

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Strong positive language ('rousing', 'raucously entertaining hit', 'blockbuster') with prediction of commercial success indicates clear enthusiasm and recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses strong enthusiasm for the production, indicating it is a must-see blockbuster.

bwwExcerpt: But, after a buzzy initial run in Chicago, Death Becomes Her has been reborn on Broadway as a rousing, raucously entertaining hit, the kind of big, box-ticking blockbuster that one can see sticking around for a long time (pre-opening, ticket sales were such that it already received an extension to the end of next summer).
